system.description: This spell allows you to scribe a potent rune upon a surface. When triggered, a symbol of sleep causes all creatures of 10 HD or less within 60 feet to fall into a catatonic slumber for 3d6 Ã— 10 minutes. The symbol can be triggered by creatures of a particular type or by all creatures. The symbol is invisible and is triggered by reading it (or by passing within 60 feet, if you so choose). A successful Disable Device check (DC 28) can disarm the symbol. The symbol lasts until discharged or 1 hour per caster level. Unlike sleep, the symbol affects all creatures of 10 HD or less.

components.materialDescription: Mercury and phosphorus, plus powdered diamond and opal worth 1,000 gp (consumed).
